title: 850 wallpapers nature hd all in one folder
description:
850 wallpapers nature hd all in one

All pictures in same folder, which makes it easy to make slide show for background in windows.


To create a custom theme picture slide show in windows 7, go to start menu --> control panel --> change desktop background --> browse --> find the downloaded folder 850 wallpapers nature hd all in one --> press OK --> press Save changes. Done!

You should now have 850 beautiful nature wallpapers that change every 30 minutes. This should keep your desktop fresh for a good while.


Recommended settings:
Sometimes we have a setting that allow windows to stretch our background image to fill up all screen. This will very often distort the picture. There are wallpapers that are designed to fit a fullscreen background, but in this case these picture are not made for fullscreen format. One safe option, that won't distort the picture, is to choose picture position to Fit. Here is how:

It is possible that you already have this setting. Anyway, to do this go to start menu --> control panel --> change desktop background --> down to left --> choose Picture Position --> Choose Fit --> Save changes. Done!
